title: Agentic Chatbot using LangGraph
features: Architected an agentic chatbot using LangGraph and LangChain, integrating real‑time web scraping to deliver contextual LLM responses in a dynamic conversational UI.
Implemented a modular node‑based workflow with reusable tools and state management, enabling seamless extensibility and maintenance across the chatbot’s service layer.
Optimized inference pipelines and deployed a Streamlit interface, cutting response latency by 30% and boosting user satisfaction scores in beta testing.
